Text: Multicable:  Whereas single cables only have three conductors, multicable has ten or more.

Text: Multicable:  Typically, both ends of multicable have a specific connector known as a Socapex Connector.

--------------------
Text: Multicable:  Technicians then combine the cables with break-outs and break-ins, which essentially are an octopus-like adapter with one Socapex end and six to eight Edison, twist-lok, or stage pin style connectors.
